attributes.action: Remove Boris Johnson as U.K. Prime Minister
attributes.additional_details: The nation has lost all faith and we get confusion, lies and corners cut constantly on all things Covid, Brexit amongst other things. The country is on its knees and we need a leader who will drive us forward
attributes.background: Rid Boris Johnson and his cabinet from Parliament

rejection.details:
We can't publish petitions about honours or appointments. That includes calling for Ministers to be sacked or to resign, or for votes of no confidence.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or the House of Commons, you could sign or start a petition about that.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign: 

Hold an immediate general election: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557074
